name: Jewel Legend - Match 3 Games
description:
WELCOME TO THE MOST ADDICTIVE & CHALLENGING JEWEL ADVENTURES!

Ultimate Jewel Legend puzzle game brings millions of players new and fun experience:
● 600+ addictive levels in Jewel Legend.
● 6 completely different matching games type.
● Easy & fun boosters to help with challenging levels.
● Addictive adventurous levels & unlock castles.
● Daily rewards & bonus.
● Play jewel without wifi.
● Enjoy in the super & cool jewel mania.
● Connect with your facebook.

How to play Jewel Legend - the most addictive match 3 game:
● Swap the jewels and match 3 same jewels.
● Use boosters to blast more jewels.
● Challenging & Fun.
● Play both online & offline game.

What are you waiting for?
Download Now!
Enjoy this superior Jewel Legend puzzle game with diverse puzzles!
